TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed TrackingWorkflowEvent extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Specifies a type of workflow status event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
A workflow instance can pass through several states during the course of its execution. For example, a workflow instance may become idle, or it may be suspended. Every time the workflow instance changes state, it emits a workflow status event to the runtime tracking infrastructure. TrackingWorkflowEvent enumerates the possible types of workflow status event.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent Aborted = int32(10)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent Changed = int32(11)

Docs.summary: A workflow change has occurred on the workflow instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent Completed = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent Created = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The workflow instance has been created.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent Exception = int32(8)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent Idle = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent Loaded = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The workflow instance has been loaded into memory.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent Persisted = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The workflow instance has been persisted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent Resumed = int32(4)

Docs.summary: A previously suspended workflow instance has resumed running.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent Started = int32(12)

Docs.summary: The workflow instance has been started.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent Suspended = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The workflow instance has been suspended.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent Terminated = int32(9)

Docs.summary: The workflow instance has been terminated.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent Unloaded = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The workflow instance has been unloaded from memory.
